mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_OPERATION ( OPERATION_ID, RESOURCE_ID , OPERATION_KEY , DEPEND_KEY , OPERATION_NAME , OPERATION_DESC , METADATA_ID , DEPEND_BY_KEY , ORDER_KEY, DOMAIN ) VALUES (#{operationId}, #{resourceId} , #{operationKey} , #{dependKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{operationName} , #{operationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{metadataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dependByKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderKey,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SEC_OPERATION SET OPERATION_NAME = #{operationName}, OPERATION_DESC = #{operationDesc}, DEPEND_KEY = #{dependKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METADATA_ID = #{metadataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId} AND OPERATION_KEY = #{operationKey}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEC_OPERATION WHERE RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId} AND OPERATION_KEY = #{operationKey}
mapper.select: SELECT RESOURCE_ID , OPERATION_KEY , DEPEND_KEY , OPERATION_NAME , OPERATION_DESC , METADATA_ID , DEPEND_BY_KEY, ORDER_KEY, DOMAIN FROM SEC_OPERATION WHERE RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId} AND OPERATION_KEY = #{operationKey}

SELECT RESOURCE_ID, OPERATION_KEY FROM SEC_ROLE_RESOURCE_OPERATION WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE STAFF_ID = #{value} UNION ALL SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE AUTO_ASSIGN = 1 )

SELECT t1.RESOURCE_KEY , t2.OPERATION_KEY FROM SEC_RESOURCES t1 left join (SELECT RESOURCE_ID, OPERATION_KEY FROM SEC_ROLE_RESOURCE_OPERATION WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE STAFF_ID = #{value} UNION ALL SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE AUTO_ASSIGN = 1 ))t2 on t1.RESOURCE_ID=t2.RESOURCE_ID where t2.OPERATION_KEY is not null

SELECT O.OPERATION_ID, O.RESOURCE_ID , O.OPERATION_KEY , O.DEPEND_KEY , O.OPERATION_NAME , O.OPERATION_DESC , O.METADATA_ID , O.DEPEND_BY_KEY, O.ORDER_KEY, O.DOMAIN FROM SEC_OPERATION O, SEC_ROLE_RESOURCE_OPERATION R WHERE O.RESOURCE_ID=R.RESOURCE_ID AND O.OPERATION_KEY=R.OPERATION_KEY AND R.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
